column3: Latest; Takeo province: A report says that a 21 year old KTV worker was found dead at 12 noon on March 4 in Roka commune
column5: Takeo province. According to initial findings
column6: she was found naked in a guesthouse room
column7: and murder is suspected.------ The victim was identified as a 21-year-old from Kantout village
column9: Traing district.------Staff at the Pa Ei Mak Ei Guesthouse said that the victim went to the room with an unidentified man
column10: who left after around one hour to get food. When he failed to return
column11: maids checked the room and made the discovery.------Police are now examining CCTV footage to try to identify the man. ------Kohsantepheap
